name: Xiosis Scribe Template
summary: Learn about .XBPLATE files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: To have document templates automatically appear in Xiosis Scribe's Desk view, place them in the following directory:

NOTE: Templates cannot be created from existing XBDOC files. They must be created from a blank document. Start with a blank document, edit the template, and then click the Save button. In the "Save As..." dialog box, choose "Xiosis Scribe Template" from the drop down list.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
